name: Botanico (Kreyk29)
description:
Pixel tower defense game about plants & bugs. Beat levels to get more plants and get more plants to beat more levels!
Special thanks to: Streg, Dark Angel, Vinegar.


Halloween event!
Beat 3 hard levels to get cool plant - Witch Hazel!
Just an homing boomerang but it's very good on it's full upgrade!
Also visit the shop and buy event plant - Pumpkin! It's a tasty
minigun.
